text.div:
TumourStageN

A code that records tumour stage N

This value set has an inline code system http://hl7.org/fhir/tumour-stage-n, which defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
nx NX Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed
n0 N0 No regional lymph node metastasis
n1 N1 Metastasis in 1-3 regional lymph nodes
n1a N1a Metastasis in one regional lymph node
n1b N1b Metastasis in 2-3 regional lymph nodes
n1c N1c Tumour deposit(s) in the subserosa, mesentery, or nonperitonealised pericolic or perirectal tissues without regional nodal metastasis
n2 N2 Metastasis in 4 or more regional lymph nodes
n2a N2a Metastasis in 4-6 regional lymph nodes
n2b N2b Metastasis in 7 or more regional lymph nodes
